bioAsHtml: Xavier Mertens is an freelance security consultant. His job focuses mainly on protecting his customer’s assets by applying “offensive” (pentesting) as well as “defensive” security (incident handling, log management, SIEM, security visualisation). Xavier holds several certifications (GCIH, CISSP, CISA, CEH). In parallel to his daily job, Xavier is also a security blogger (http://blog.rootshell.be) and a co-organizer of the BruCON security conference.
